showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:1}); // {Cloud}
“This is the center of the Planet?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:52}); // {Cloud}
“All right, everyone, let's mosey.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:73}); // {Cloud}
“This is all we could do.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:75}); // {Cloud}
“That…I don't know.
Isn't the rest up to the Planet?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:37}); // {Barret}
“Oh yeah, {Yuffie},
didn't you find somethin'?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:67}); // {Barret}
“{Cloud}!
Hurry up and
make up your mind!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:74}); // {Barret}
“Wait! What about Holy?
What's gonna happen
to the Planet?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:62}); // {Tifa}
“Is this like a practice run
before the final battle?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:76}); // {Tifa}
“…You're right.”{PAUSE}“We've done all that we could do.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:13}); // {Red XIII}
“{Cloud}, I found this…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:16}); // {Red XIII}
“{Cloud}…
“{Cloud}…
Seems like you got too much Materia.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:38}); // {Red XIII}
“By the way {Yuffie},
didn't you find something on the way?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:56}); // {Red XIII}
“Look at the number…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:66}); // {Red XIII}
“They're coming!
They're already on the floor next to us!”

ops.raw: a5 00 00 b5 fd d1 ff 79 ff 0f 00

ops.description:
showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:19}); // {Cid}
“Hey, {Cloud},
I found this on the way.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:39}); // {Cid}
“Yeah, {Yuffie},
didn't you pick up something on the way?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:53}); // {Cid}
“Damn! Again!”{PAUSE}“Stop sayin' it like a wimp!”{PAUSE}“Can't you say
'Move out!' or somethin'?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:57}); // {Cid}
“%#@^! They're comin'
out in full force!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:61}); // {Cid}
“{Barret}'s right.”{PAUSE}“You take two of us with
you and go first. The rest'll
catch up with ya later.”

ops.raw: a5 00 00 cb fe c9 00 cb fe 19 00

ops.description:
showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:64}); // {Yuffie}
“I'm fine with that.”
(It's probably more fun than
meeting Sephiroth down there.)

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:24}); // {Cait Sith}
“Hey, {Cloud},
I found this.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:40}); // {Cait Sith}
“By the way, {Yuffie},
didn't you pick up something?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:63}); // {Cait Sith}
“Yeah, a major practice run…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:33}); // {Vincent}
“No, first organize your Materia.
You have too much.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:41}); // {Vincent}
“{Yuffie},
just let {Cloud} have it.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:65}); // {Vincent}
“Hmm, this might be
fun to pass time.”

ops.raw: d0 e6 fd 6b ff 95 ff 7c fd d4 ff 8b ff
d0 d9 fe 00 00 c2 fe 28 fe 13 00 c0 fe

dialogStrings:
{Cloud}
“This is the center of the Planet?”

{Red XIII}
“{Cloud}…
“{Cloud}…
Seems like you got too much Materia.”

{Cid}
“Hey, {Cloud},
I found this on the way.”

{Vincent}
“No, first organize your Materia.
You have too much.”

{Vincent}
“Hmm…
Being with you all isn't so bad.”

{Tifa}
“By the way {Yuffie},
didn't you find something?”

{Red XIII}
“By the way {Yuffie},
didn't you find something on the way?”

{Cid}
“Yeah, {Yuffie},
didn't you pick up something on the way?”

{Cait Sith}
“By the way, {Yuffie},
didn't you pick up something?”

{Yuffie}
“But I'm the one who found it,
so you better give it back to me
when you're done with it!”

{Yuffie}
“Hey!?
But you have lots of Materia!
Then you won't need it.”

{Yuffie}
“It feels like we made
it as far as we can.”

{Cid}
“Damn! Again!”{PAUSE}“Stop sayin' it like a wimp!”{PAUSE}“Can't you say
'Move out!' or somethin'?”

{Cid}
“%#@^! They're comin'
out in full force!”

{Barret}
“Shu'up! It won't
do us no good wit'
everyone back here!”

{Cid}
“{Barret}'s right.”{PAUSE}“You take two of us with
you and go first. The rest'll
catch up with ya later.”

{Tifa}
“Is this like a practice run
before the final battle?”

{Yuffie}
“I'm fine with that.”
(It's probably more fun than
meeting Sephiroth down there.)

{Vincent}
“Hmm, this might be
fun to pass time.”

{Red XIII}
“They're coming!
They're already on the floor next to us!”

{Barret}
“{Cloud}!
Hurry up and
make up your mind!”

{Barret}
“Wait! What about Holy?
What's gonna happen
to the Planet?”

{Cloud}
“That…I don't know.
Isn't the rest up to the Planet?”

{Tifa}
“…You're right.”{PAUSE}“We've done all that we could do.”
